author: Jerry "The Professor" Thomas
description: Fruity yet complex with the oak maturation of both spirits and liqueurs adding depth of flavour.
name: Prince of Wales Punch
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE pineapple in base of shaker
Add next five ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass
